title: No search results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog in Bug 4329, no results are found. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
OB: The Search dialog in the Package view should be initialized with the element name instead of the fully qualified name. Currently, the search is performed using the fully qualified name, which leads to no results when searching for declarations.
EB: The Search dialog in the Package view should be updated to use the element name instead of the fully qualified name when performing the search.
SR: Ensure that the search functionality in the Package view is functioning correctly by searching for the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
